ai-patthana15.23:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.23:0.3_0: should apply himself to the skillful.
ai-patthana15.23:1.1_0: Nothing is a cause of the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.23:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.23:2.1_0: Not wearing away is a cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.23:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three kinds of determined.’ ...
ai-patthana15.23:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of undeclared.
ai-patthana15.23:3.1_1: For one converses, the basis of psychic power ...
